Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitie.label: Other Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
OtherAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitie.description: Amount of liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received classified as other, and expenses incurred but not yet paid, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurr.label: Other Accrued Liabilities
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurr.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other.

OtherAdditionalCapital.label: Other Additional Capital
OtherAdditionalCapital.description: Amount of additional paid-in capital (APIC) classified as other.

OtherCommitment.label: Other Commitment
OtherCommitment.description: Minimum amount of other commitment not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Excludes commitments explicitly modeled in the taxonomy, including but not limited to, long-term and short-term purchase commitments, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, supply commitments, registration payment arrangements, leases, debt, product warranties, guarantees, environmental remediation obligations, and pensions.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Adjustment that results from the process of translating subsidiary financial statements and foreign equity investments into the reporting currency of the reporting entity, net of tax.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interests.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherLoansPayableLongTerm.label: Other Loans Payable, Long-term, Noncurrent
OtherLoansPayableLongTerm.description: Amount of long-term loans classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherLongTermDebt.label: Other Long-term Debt
OtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Current
OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherLongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
OtherLongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherPrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Other Prepaid Expense, Current
OtherPrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for other costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherReceivables.label: Other Receivables
OtherReceivables.description: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.

OtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Other Short-term Borrowings
OtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Amount of borrowings classified as other, maturing within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsForLegalSettlements.label: Payments for Legal Settlements
PaymentsForLegalSettlements.description: The amount of cash paid for the settlement of litigation or for other legal issues during the period.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForRemovalCosts.label: Payments for Removal Costs
PaymentsForRemovalCosts.description: Cash outflow related to disposal costs of plants, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.

PaymentsForRent.label: Payments for Rent
PaymentsForRent.description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PaymentsToAcquireLandHeldForUse.label: Payments to Acquire Land Held-for-use
PaymentsToAcquireLandHeldForUse.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of land for use; excludes purchases of land held as inventory or as investments.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToEmployees.label: Payments to Employees
PaymentsToEmployees.description: Payments of cash to employees, including wages and salaries, during the current period.

PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.label: Payments to Fund Long-term Loans to Related Parties
PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.description: The cash outflow associated with extending a long-term loan to a related party. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances to Affiliates.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidInterest.label: Prepaid Interest
PrepaidInterest.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromBankDebt.label: Proceeds from Bank Debt
ProceedsFromBankDebt.description: The cash inflow from bank borrowing during the year.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.label: Proceeds from Collection of Long-term Loans to Related Parties
ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.description: The cash inflow associated with collection, whether partial or full, of long-term loans to a related party. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances to Affiliates.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Debt
ProceedsFromOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromOtherDeposits.label: Proceeds from Other Deposits
ProceedsFromOtherDeposits.description: Amount of cash inflow for receipts of deposits classified as other.

ProceedsFromOtherEquity.label: Proceeds from Other Equity
ProceedsFromOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash inflow from the issuance of equity classified as other.

ProceedsFromOtherOperatingActivities.label: Proceeds from Other Operating Activities
ProceedsFromOtherOperatingActivities.description: Amount of cash inflow from operating activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Other Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) for debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProductWarrantyAccrualClassifiedCurrent.label: Product Warranty Accrual, Current
ProductWarrantyAccrualClassifiedCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for estimated claims under standard and extended warranty protection rights granted to customers. For classified balance sheets, represents the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

ProductWarrantyAccrualNoncurrent.label: Product Warranty Accrual, Noncurrent
ProductWarrantyAccrualNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer) for estimated claims under standard and extended warranty protection rights granted to customers.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

PublicUtilitiesApprovedEquityCapitalStru.label: Public Utilities, Approved Equity Capital Structure, Percentage
PublicUtilitiesApprovedEquityCapitalStru.description: Percentage of public utility's approved equity to capital, including debt and equity.

RealEstateRevenueNet.label: Real Estate Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RealEstateRevenueNet.description: The aggregate revenue from real estate operations during the reporting period.

RepaymentsOfBankDebt.label: Repayments of Bank Debt
RepaymentsOfBankDebt.description: The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.label: Research and Development Expense
ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.description: The aggregate costs incurred (1) in a planned search or critical investigation aimed at discovery of new knowledge with the hope that such knowledge will be useful in developing a new product or service, a new process or technique, or in bringing about a significant improvement to an existing product or process; or (2) to translate research findings or other knowledge into a plan or design for a new product or process or for a significant improvement to an existing product or process whether intended for sale or the entity's use, during the reporting period charged to research and development projects, including the costs of developing computer software up to the point in time of achieving technological feasibility, and costs allocated in accounting for a business combination to in-process projects deemed to have no alternative future use.

RestrictedStockExpense.label: Restricted Stock or Unit Expense
RestrictedStockExpense.description: Amount of noncash expense for award of restricted stock or unit under share-based payment arrangement.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

RevenueFromGrants.label: Revenue from Grants (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RevenueFromGrants.description: Revenue earned during the period from non-repayable sum of money awarded to an entity to carry out a specific purpose as provided in grant agreements.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

SaleOfStockPricePerShare.label: Sale of Stock, Price Per Share
SaleOfStockPricePerShare.description: Per share amount received by subsidiary or equity investee for each share of common stock issued or sold in the stock transaction.

SalesRevenueGoodsNet.label: Sales Revenue, Goods, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueGoodsNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from the sale of goods in the normal course of business, after deducting returns, allowances and discounts.

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

SecuritiesSegregatedUnderSecuritiesExcha.label: Securities Segregated under Securities Exchange Commission Regulation
SecuritiesSegregatedUnderSecuritiesExcha.description: Fair value of securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

SellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Selling and Marketing Expense
SellingAndMarketingExpense.description: The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested, Number of Shares
Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Number of Shares

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

SharesIssued.label: Shares, Issued
SharesIssued.description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

SharesIssuedPricePerShare.label: Shares Issued, Price Per Share
SharesIssuedPricePerShare.description: Per share or per unit amount of equity securities issued.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermDebtInterestRateIncrease.label: Short-term Debt, Interest Rate Increase
ShortTermDebtInterestRateIncrease.description: Percentage increase in the stated interest rate on a short-term debt instrument.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityBeforeTreasuryStock.label: Stockholders' Equity before Treasury Stock
StockholdersEquityBeforeTreasuryStock.description: Total amount of stockholders' equity (deficit) items including stock value, paid in capital, retained earnings and including equity attributable to noncontrolling interests and before deducting the carrying value of treasury stock.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Gross
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.description: Total number of shares issued during the period, including shares forfeited, as a result of Restricted Stock Awards.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number of shares (or other type of equity) forfeited during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value of forfeited shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.label: Value Added Tax Receivable, Current
ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedS.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Restricted Stock
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedS.description: Number of shares of restricted stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that restricted shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Restricted shares are subject to sales, contractual, regulatory or other restrictions that prevent or inhibit the holder from freely disposing of them before the restriction ends.

AccountsPayableAndOtherAccruedLiabilitie.label: Accounts Payable and Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccountsPayableAndOtherAccruedLiabilitie.description: Amount of liabilities incurred to vendors for goods and services received, and accrued liabilities classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AssetsHeldInTrustNoncurrent.label: Assets Held-in-trust, Noncurrent
AssetsHeldInTrustNoncurrent.description: The amount of cash, securities, or other assets held by a third-party trustee pursuant to the terms of an agreement which assets are available to be used by beneficiaries to that agreement only within the specific terms thereof and which agreement is expected to terminate more than one year from the balance sheet date (or operating cycle, if longer) at which time the assets held-in-trust will be released or forfeited.

BenefitsLossesAndExpenses.label: Benefits, Losses and Expenses
BenefitsLossesAndExpenses.description: The total amount of expense recognized during the period for future policy benefits, claims and claims adjustment costs, and for selling, general and administrative costs.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of assets acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Buildings
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of facility held for productive use including, but not limited to, office, production, storage and distribution facilities, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Cash and Equivalents
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, acquired at the acquisition date. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets, Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets, Receivables
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount due from customers or clients for goods or services, including trade receivables, that have been delivered or sold in the normal course of business, and amounts due from others, including related parties expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Accounts Payable
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of liabilities incurred for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business and related party payables, assumed at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Equipment
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Indefinite-Lived Intangible Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, that lack physical substance, having a projected indefinite period of benefit, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Intangible Assets, Other than Goodwill
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of intangible assets, excluding goodwill, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Inventory
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: The amount of inventory recognized as of the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Net
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount recognized as of the acquisition date for the identifiable assets acquired in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Property, Plant, and Equipment
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: The amount of property, plant, and equipment recognized as of the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired, Goodwill, and Liabilities Assumed, Net
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount recognized for assets, including goodwill, in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed.

CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CommonStockNoParValue.label: Common Stock, No Par Value
CommonStockNoParValue.description: Face amount per share of no-par value common stock.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.description: Contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

DeferredCreditsAndOtherLiabilitiesCurren.label: Deferred Credits and Other Liabilities, Current
DeferredCreditsAndOtherLiabilitiesCurren.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unearned revenue or income, not otherwise specified in the taxonomy, which is expected to be taken into income during the current period and current obligations not separately disclosed in the balance sheet (other liabilities, current).

DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Tax Credits
DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) and income tax credits.

DeferredTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.label: Derivative Assets (Liabilities), at Fair Value, Net
DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Income (Loss)
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating income (loss) attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DueFromOtherRelatedParties.label: Due from Other Related Parties
DueFromOtherRelatedParties.description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other.

DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due from Related Parties, Current
DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: The aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due within one year (or one business cycle).

DueFromRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Due from Related Parties, Noncurrent
DueFromRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: Aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle).

DueToOtherRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Due to Other Related Parties, Noncurrent
DueToOtherRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: Amount payable from related parties classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

EarnestMoneyDeposits.label: Earnest Money Deposits
EarnestMoneyDeposits.description: A deposit made by a purchaser of real estate to evidence good faith. It is customary for a buyer to give the seller earnest money at the time a sales contract is signed. The earnest money generally is credited to the down payment at closing, which is applied at closing as a component of payment against the purchase price.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Next Rolling Twelve Months
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling after Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

GainOrLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiary.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Stock in Subsidiary
GainOrLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiary.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncomeTaxesReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable, Current
IncomeTaxesReceivable.description: Carrying amount due within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationPriorYearIncomeTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Prior Year Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationPriorYearIncomeTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to revisions of previously reported income tax expense (benefit).

InterestCostsIncurred.label: Interest Costs Incurred
InterestCostsIncurred.description: Total interest costs incurred during the period and either capitalized or charged against earnings.

LaborAndRelatedExpense.label: Labor and Related Expense
LaborAndRelatedExpense.description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

MarketableSecuritiesGainLoss.label: Marketable Securities, Gain (Loss)
MarketableSecuritiesGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OperatingCostsAndExpenses.label: Operating Costs and Expenses
OperatingCostsAndExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Excludes Selling, General and Administrative Expense.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherBorrowings.label: Other Borrowings
OtherBorrowings.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date for the aggregate of other miscellaneous borrowings owed by the reporting entity.

OtherMinorityInterests.label: Other Noncontrolling Interests
OtherMinorityInterests.description: Carrying amount of equity interests owned by noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in one or more of the entities consolidated into the reporting entity's financial statements other than joint ventures, limited partnerships, operating partnerships or interests held by preferred unit holders.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PaymentsForDeposits.label: Payments for Deposits
PaymentsForDeposits.description: The amount of cash paid for deposits on goods and services during the period; excludes time deposits and deposits with other institutions, which pertain to financial service entities.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.label: Payments to Acquire Additional Interest in Subsidiaries
PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of noncontrolling interest during the period.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Receivables, Net, Current
ReceivablesNetCurrent.description: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipAfterTra.label: Sale of Stock, Percentage of Ownership after Transaction
SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipAfterTra.description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company after stock transaction.

SecuritiesBorrowedAllowanceForCreditLoss.label: Securities Borrowed, Allowance for Credit Loss
SecuritiesBorrowedAllowanceForCreditLoss.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on security borrowed.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of options vested.

ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedInter.label: Short-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest Rate
ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedInter.description: The portion of the carrying amount of short-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

AmountOfRegulatoryAssistanceReceived1.label: Amount of Regulatory Assistance Received
AmountOfRegulatoryAssistanceReceived1.description: Amount of regulatory assistance received from a federal regulatory agency in conjunction with either an acquisition of a troubled financial institution, transfer of nonperforming assets to a newly-formed entity, or other reorganization.

CostsIncurredExplorationCosts.label: Costs Incurred, Exploration Costs
CostsIncurredExplorationCosts.description: Exploration costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in oil and gas activities.

DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuatio.label: Deferred Taxes, Business Combination, Valuation Allowance, Available to Reduce Goodwill and Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuatio.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's goodwill and other noncurrent intangible assets.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

InterestAndDividendsPayableCurrentAndNon.label: Interest and Dividends Payable
InterestAndDividendsPayableCurrentAndNon.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of (a) interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred, and (b) dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding (also includes dividends collected on behalf of another owner of securities that are being held by the entity).

LongtermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.label: Long-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest, Amount
LongtermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.description: The portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

OtherResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.label: Other Research and Development Expense
OtherResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.description: Amount of other research and development expense.

OtherSellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Other Selling and Marketing Expense
OtherSellingAndMarketingExpense.description: Amount of selling and marketing expense classified as other.

PaymentsForLoans.label: Payments for Loans
PaymentsForLoans.description: Cash payments for and related to principal collection on loans related to operating activities.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Agreed-upon price for the exchange of the underlying asset relating to the share-based payment award.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the option's term.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

Capital.label: Banking Regulation, Total Capital, Actual
Capital.description: Amount of total capital as defined by regulatory framework.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciationAn.label: Cost, Depreciation and Amortization
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciationAn.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

DebtInstrumentFeeAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Fee Amount
DebtInstrumentFeeAmount.description: Amount of the fee that accompanies borrowing money under the debt instrument.

DerivativeCapInterestRate.label: Derivative, Cap Interest Rate
DerivativeCapInterestRate.description: Cap rate on an interest rate derivative such as an interest rate cap or collar. If market rates exceed the cap rate, a payment or receipt is triggered on the contract.

EarningsPerShareBasicDistributed.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic, Distributed
EarningsPerShareBasicDistributed.description: Dividends declared in the period and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid per security.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationRepa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Repatriation of Foreign Earnings, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationRepa.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the repatriation of foreign earnings.

GeneralPartnersContributedCapital.label: General Partners' Contributed Capital
GeneralPartnersContributedCapital.description: The amount of capital contributed by the general partner.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.label: Repayments of Convertible Debt
RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received Per Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.description: Amount of consideration received by subsidiary or equity investee in exchange for shares of stock issued or sold. Includes amount of cash received, fair value of noncash assets received, and fair value of liabilities assumed by the investor.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.label: Tax Adjustments, Settlements, and Unusual Provisions
TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to previously recorded tax expense. Includes, but is not limited to, significant settlements of income tax disputes, and unusual tax positions or infrequent actions taken by the entity, including tax assessment reversal, and IRS tax settlement.

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Sale or Disposal of Property, Plant and Equipment
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: Amount of decrease in accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization as a result of sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossO.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Other than Temporary Impairment, Not Credit Loss, Net of Tax, Available-for-sale, Debt Securities
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossO.description: Accumulated other comprehensive loss related to portion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) due to factors other than credit losses on debt securities categorized as available-for-sale that an entity does not intend to sell and which it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis of the debt security. The amount represented by this item is net of tax, as applicable.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, from recovery.

AssetsUnderManagementCarryingAmount.label: Assets under Management, Carrying Amount
AssetsUnderManagementCarryingAmount.description: The carrying amount of assets an investment adviser manages on behalf of investors.

CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedF.label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield
CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedF.description: The aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan for loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DepreciationExpenseOnReclassifiedAssets.label: Depreciation Expense on Reclassified Assets
DepreciationExpenseOnReclassifiedAssets.description: For the asset that is reclassified back to held and use from held-for-sale, the depreciation expense recognized when the asset is reclassified. This represents the difference between the carrying value at the time the decision to reclassify is made and the carrying amount that the asset would have had if it had never been classified as held for sale (including consideration of depreciation expense).

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Gain (Loss) Included in Earnings
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingCapital.label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Capital
IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingCapital.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all assets and liabilities used in operating activities.

LesseeFinanceLeaseDiscountRate.label: Lessee, Finance Lease, Discount Rate
LesseeFinanceLeaseDiscountRate.description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of finance lease payments.

LongTermInvestments.label: Long-term Investments
LongTermInvestments.description: The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle).

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementInitialDir.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Initial Direct Costs
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementInitialDir.description: Costs that are essential to acquiring the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred negotiating, processing, and closing the lease agreement.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Additions
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.description: Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.description: Amount after depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.
